oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of two new hexaquinanes: advanced C20 precursors to dodecahedrane
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, SAMBASIVARAO
SIVAKUMAR, RALLAPALLI
DAMODHARAN, LAKSHMINARASIMHAN
PATTABHI, VASANTHA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: crystal structure
x-ray diffraction
isomerisation
stereochemistry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple synthesis of hexaquinane diones 2 and 22 involving bench-top chemicals is reported. These two hexaquinanes are advanced C20 precursors to dodecahedrane 1 either by C-C bond formation reactions or by the isomerisation approach.
